amendment.description: To strike the section relating to the Ojito Wilderness.

vote.text: Amendment SA 5110 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5110 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici. (consideration: CR S10535; text: CR S10535) To strike the section relating to the Ojito Wilderness.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5110 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Domenici.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5110 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
